772DHepuIzw.title: Minnesota Twins Select CenturyLink® Business as Official Telecommunications Provider
772DHepuIzw.desc:
CenturyLink® Business provides all of the voice, video, security, and network equipment in a converged IP solution that delivers an experience for up to 40,000 fans in the stadium. CenturyLink® Business also supports the entire Minnesota Twins business operations with local, long distance, Internet, and wide area network services to link millions of fans all over the world. As you can see, CenturyLink Business is passionate about connecting business customers and we're willing to prove that same dedication to all of our clients.

http://www.centurylink.com/business/

yvxl89QaxTc.title: IPv6 Overview - How to Effectively Migrate to IPv6
yvxl89QaxTc.desc:
If you want to make a full migration to native IPv6 for your entire infrastructure, we can do that. Or, if you want to leverage your existing infrastructure on an IPv6 backbone, taking advantage of both scenarios, we can do that too. Find out more about the flexible migration options provided by CenturyLink migration experts.

http://www.centurylink.com/business/products/products-and-services/data-networking/list.html

NzvqYsu2grc.title: IPv6 Overview - An Introduction
NzvqYsu2grc.desc:
Making the transition to IPv6 now will ensure that your business keeps pace with the rapid expansion of the Internet and that you and your customers are speaking the same language.

http://www.centurylink.com/business/products/products-and-services/data-networking/list.html

7GXJeywZ77Y.title: CenturyLink® Builds the World's Largest Portable Network to Serve Interop's 350 Exhibitors
7GXJeywZ77Y.desc:

http://www.centurylink.com/business/

p_IqXcPsbC0.title: How Will Technology Impact Your Business in 2020?
p_IqXcPsbC0.desc:
Download our new eBook today!: http://www.thinkgig.com/how-will-technology-impact-your-business-in-2020-ebook/

Human-like technology. The potential downfall of the data center. Hyper-personalization of data. These are some of the responses IT leaders gave to us when we asked, "What will business technology look like in 2020?" Learn more in our new eBook: 

http://www.thinkgig.com/how-will-technology-impact-your-business-in-2020-ebook/

iufmwUvs2dw.title: Why CenturyLink?
iufmwUvs2dw.desc:
CenturyLink Offers a Powerful Alternative to Business As Usual

You can depend on a flexible communications provider, like CenturyLink, that listens and has the resources to deliver exactly what your business needs. CenturyLink gives you more choices from a wide array of world-class solutions scaled to fit your needs even as your business grows.

http://www.centurylink.com/business/solutions/why-centurylink/list.html

1uqoxDY5_3k.desc:
Go to http://www.centurylink.com/link to discover how CenturyLink's cloud-hosting infrastructure and managed services can help free you to focus on what matters. 

Sunday is your day to unplug and recharge. With CenturyLink as your trusted technology partner, you have the advantage of a visionary cloud infrastructure and global broadband network that help your business shine -- every day of the week.

Mondays aren't easy. But with CenturyLink as your trusted technology partner, your business will shine all week long. Our global broadband network and custom communications solutions mean your business is more reliable, secure and agile. And our responsive, dedicated support helps make sure you're at the top of your game -- every day of the week.
